EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-29-Activate Your Cloud Sweepstakes Ignite LAST CALL.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE TO ENTER! - Win a Microsoft Ignite Full Conference Pass!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst&utm_content=08292017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Don’t miss your chance to enter to win a Microsoft Ignite® full conference pass, part of the Turbonomic Cloud Burst Sweepstakes series! The drawing to win the event pass will held on September 1, 2017. The Cloud Burst Sweepstakes offers a different prize every month this fall. For the month of September, we are offering a Microsoft Ignite full conference pass. Head out to sunny Orlando for five days of innovative presentations, valuable networking, and insightful keynote speakers (including Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella). Enter now for a chance to win September’s prize and unlock access to our October drawing! <[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst&utm_content=08292017]]>
September 1: Microsoft Ignite® Full Conference Pass (September 25 - 29, 2017) October 13: LOCKED November 3: LOCKED
-The Turbonomic Team
